Seaside Catering

Code: Repository

Website: View Site

Purpose and Objectives

The purpose of this project was to create a simple brochure website for a business that provides private catering services. I researched business websites and came across The Highland Kitchen. I was impressed with how this website was designed and subsequently decided to clone it.
